title: 3D Datacenter
description: This WebGL project was developed as a quick reference utility at the Data Center.
With the ability to visualize the machines in the Data Center in a 3D space, this program allows users to quickly find what they are looking for.
By allowing the user to search for machines or racks by name, it turns a tedious task into a trivial one.
And by having an accurate depiction of the room, the user is able to gain a strong sense for the location of the desired machine.
